overview_summary: None of these nearby landowners have a publicly documented stance on the proposed development, so all are classified with an unknown position. One neighbor (the Hartigan family) appears to carry medium influence locally as a multigenerational farm family, while the others have low or unremarkable community influence.

neighbors.name: Mildred R Tandy
neighbors.claims: Mildred R. Tandy is a landowner in Princeton, Caldwell County [Times Leader](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/times-leader/name/james-tandy-obituary?id=52161744). The Tandy family name has longstanding roots in the area; a local road (Tandy Rd) is named after the family [Zillow](https://www.zillow.com/homedetails/Tandy-Rd-Princeton-KY-42445/306506788_zpid/).

approach_recommendations.engage: Leverage long-standing community ties to introduce the project respectfully, emphasizing respect for the family’s history and legacy on the land.

neighbors.name: R E A
neighbors.claims: The Caldwell County PVA lists the owner of parcel 52-6 simply as “R E A,” a non-standard entry likely indicating a corporate or trust ownership [Caldwell County PVA](https://www.qpublic.net/ky/caldwell/search.html). No identifiable individual in the community matches the initials “R E A,” leaving this owner’s identity and views unclear.

approach_recommendations.engage: Clarify this ownership through county records or title research first; once identified, tailor outreach accordingly, as this appears to be an entity or absentee stakeholder with no obvious local presence.

neighbors.name: Dana K Hartigan
neighbors.claims: Dana K. Hartigan is associated with two parcels (52-8 and 53-6) in the Hartigan Road area of Caldwell County [HudwayGlass Directory](https://hudwayglass.com/HARTIGAN+RD,+Princeton+KY). The Hartigan family has an established multigenerational farm there, including a farmhouse built in 1864 [HudwayGlass Directory](https://hudwayglass.com/HARTIGAN+RD,+Princeton+KY). Multiple generations of Hartigans, such as Robert A. Hartigan (age 106) and Janice L. Hartigan (age 73), have been listed at the Hartigan Road property [HudwayGlass Directory](https://hudwayglass.com/HARTIGAN+RD,+Princeton+KY).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via trusted agricultural community members (e.g., farm bureau or extension) familiar to the family, and highlight how the project can coexist with or even benefit their long-held family farming legacy.
